title: Hollow Knight PackageDef
description: Package definition schema for Hollow Knight mods and modpacks

name.$comment: The name of the mod or modpack.

description.$comment: A brief description of the mod or modpack.

authors.$comment: The authors of the mod or modpack. What constitutes authorship is up for interpretation.

devDependencies.$comment: Optional runtime dependencies; required to install for compilation but not needed at runtime.

releaseAssets.$comment: The mod assets used for release, referring to files on disk releative to the project directory. Can either be a single cross-platform asset or single-platform assets for one or more platforms.

additionalAssets.$comment: A list of additional non-mod assets e.g. skins, etc to install with the pack.

ReleaseAssets.$comment: A cross-platform asset name/path, or a collection of such assets for various target platforms.

PlatformAssets.$comment: A collection of single-platform asset names/paths for various target platforms.

AdditionalAsset.$comment: A non-mod asset to be installed.

downloadUrl.$comment: The download URL for the file to download

installPath.$comment: The install path relative to the provided root directory.

installRootDir.$comment: The root directory to install the asset to.

InstallationRoot.$comment: Folders valid for use as asset installation directories.

ArrayReferences.$comment: An array of mod names. Version is inferred to be @modlinks.

MappedReferences.$comment: Mapping of mod name to the desired version.

ReferenceDef.$comment: A structured reference to a downloadable mod from any of various sources.

alternateInstallName.$comment: An alternate folder name to use to install, if your local folder name is different from the modlinks mod name.

fileType.$comment: Whether to treat the file as a zip or dll on installation. 'infer' makes a best effort to automatically determine the type from the file extension.

ref.$comment: A reference to a mod download from GitHub, ModLinks, or direct download link.

StringVersion.$comment:
A mod version identifier. Versions are processed, in precedence order, as follows:
* Direct download URL
* @latest or @modlinks, specifying the latest version in the git repo or the latest version on modlinks respectively
* A modlinks version number matching the format X.Y.Z.W
* A github release tag

GitReference.$comment: A reference to a GitHub release, retrieved via a mod's repository field in modlinks.

asset.$comment: Disambiguator for which asset(s) to use from the linked release, possibly platform-dependent. If there is only one asset on the release, this field is optional and usage of that asset is inferred.

tag.$comment: The tag of the GitHub release to use.

useLatestRelease.$comment: If set, this flag uses the latest published release on the mod's repository. The tag field is ignored.

ModlinksReference.$comment: A reference to a ModLinks release.

useLatestPublished.$comment: If set, this flag uses the latest version of the mod on modlinks. The version field is ignored.

version.$comment: The modlinks version number to use, in the form 'X.Y.Z.W'.

LinkReference.$comment: A reference to a direct download release.

link.$comment: A direct link to the file to download.
